job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with interdisciplinary teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly reflects the ability to understand business needs and convert them into actionable technical requirements, aligning with the definition of Business Understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, and implementing end-to-end web applications using modern frameworks and technologies
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly describes the core activities of building and deploying software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Building efficient and scalable back-end systems and APIs for seamless data integration
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of foundational software components that enable data flow and interaction, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating intuitive user interfaces and engaging user experiences using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
job_tasks.justification: This involves the front-end development aspect of building user-facing applications, which falls under Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting thorough testing and debugging to ensure the quality and performance of the developed applications
job_tasks.justification: Testing and debugging are integral parts of the software development lifecycle to ensure application quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Providing technical support and troubleshooting for existing software systems
job_tasks.justification: Supporting and troubleshooting existing applications is a common responsibility within software development roles.
While not a full data engineering process, 'seamless data integration' implies the handling and connection of data, which is a component of data engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with interdisciplinary teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions
Staying up to date with the latest trends in the industry and emerging technologies to continuously improve development practices
Conducting thorough testing and debugging to ensure the quality and performance of the developed applications
Providing technical support and troubleshooting for existing software systems

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional web application development, including UI/UX, back-end systems, and APIs. There is no mention of generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, or any specific GenAI frameworks, which are the core requirements for a GenAI Engineer.
